column4: what is the best program for making a LAN where i can tansfer files to a computer that runs Ubuntu 10.04 to a computer that runs Windows 7 Starter
samba is giving me trouble.... is there a second best?
my windows on the workgroup MSHOME and my ubuntu computer is on 'workgroup' i thtink
edit /etc/samba/smb.conf to set your workgroups to be the same.
